summary: Professional, responsive, SEO-friendly website with clean layout, full-screen fixed background image theme (with dark overlay for readability), ad/affiliate placeholders, core pages (Home, Blog, About Me), plus a working mobile hamburger menu and enhanced modern/neon styling for improved readability and visual impact.
architectural_notes: Home page ad region should support embedding third-party ad network code (external async script + container div) in place of a placeholder, while keeping the rest of the layout unchanged.

Site-wide visual theme should support a full-screen fixed background image (parallax-style) with a dark overlay layer to preserve text contrast/readability; must be responsive across mobile and desktop.

Mobile navigation must include a hamburger menu icon on small screens; on open, it must reveal 'কাজ', 'পেমেন্ট প্রুফ', and 'সাহায্য' items and preserve the existing Help submenu links (Admin 1/Admin 2).

Because the site uses a full-screen background image, all text blocks must maintain sufficient contrast via a subtle dark translucent backing and/or text-shadow; ensure readability on mobile and desktop.

Home page should include a top-of-page Welcome section featuring provided Bengali text, center-aligned in a bold Bengali font, with neon/gradient glow styling and a slow rainbow animation; place the text inside a semi-transparent dark glassmorphism container to maintain readability over the fixed background image.

Welcome section Bengali text is explicitly provided and must be used verbatim, styled bold + center-aligned with rainbow light animation: 'আসসালামু আলাইকুম। আমি Md. Habibur Rahman, এই ওয়েবসাইটটি আমার। এখানে অতি শীঘ্রই আমি বিভিন্ন ধরনের ইনকাম সাইট এড করবো এবং সম্পূর্ণ ফ্রিতে কাজ শিখিয়ে দিবো। বি:দ্র: অনেক সহজ কাজ এড করবো, যেটা আপনি ১০-৩০ মিনিটের মধ্যে শিখে যাবেন। কোনো প্রয়োজনে আমার ফেসবুক আইডিতে যোগাযোগ করতে পারেন।'

existing_features.title: Create a responsive site layout with a clean, professional design, including a header navigation (Home, Blog, About Me), footer, and consistent spacing/typography across pages.

Implement dedicated, clearly labeled placeholders/sections for advertisements and affiliate links within the layout and key pages (e.g., sidebar or in-content blocks), using reusable components so placements can be easily changed later.
Build the Home page with a professional landing layout (headline, short intro, and sections that can be expanded later), including at least one ad placeholder region.
Build the About Me page with sections for biography, expertise/interests, and contact/social placeholder fields, including an optional ad/affiliate placeholder region.
Create a Blog section with (1) a blog list page and (2) an individual blog post detail page, with a basic post model (title, slug, excerpt, content, published date) and at least a few sample posts.

Add SEO best-practices for Home, Blog (list and detail), and About pages: unique page titles/descriptions, semantic HTML structure (single H1, headings), Open Graph/Twitter metadata, and canonical URL support where applicable.

Provide crawlability assets for search engines by adding static `robots.txt` and `sitemap.xml` to the frontend public assets, including routes for Home, Blog list, About, and blog post URLs derived from available post slugs.

Define and apply one coherent visual theme (colors, typography, layout style) that feels professional and content-focused, and enforce it consistently across all pages and components (avoid blue/purple as primary accents).
Add the generated static images to the frontend and use them in the UI (e.g., logo in header and hero banner on Home) by serving them from `frontend/public/assets/generated`.
Update the site/blog branding text from "MyBlog" to "MHS Habibur Blog" anywhere it is shown to users, including the header brand text, site-wide config metadata, and footer copyright.

Write and add 5 professional, reader-useful blog posts focused on “Online Income” and “Digital Marketing” to the blog section by updating the sample fallback posts used by the Blog list/detail pages (`frontend/src/lib/blogSampleFallback.ts`). Each post must include a catchy title, a unique URL-safe slug, a clear excerpt, substantial content, and a realistic published timestamp.
Update the static sitemap (`frontend/public/sitemap.xml`) so it includes the blog post URLs for the 5 new blog post slugs and removes URLs for any deleted/replaced sample posts.

Replace the Home page "Advertisement Space" banner placeholder with the provided Adsterra native banner embed so the real ad can render. Implement the embed safely in React by creating a dedicated ad component that (1) renders the required container div with id "container-f611970e20286f1dc66f1d89f295d869" and (2) loads the external script "https://pl28724796.effectivegatecpm.com/f611970e20286f1dc66f1d89f295d869/invoke.js" on the client only (avoid duplicating the script tag if the user navigates away/back). Update `frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx` to use this new Adsterra component in place of `<AdPlaceholder variant="banner" ... />` while leaving other pages’ ad placeholders unchanged.

Create optimized background image assets from the uploaded file `1770720033234.jpg` for desktop and mobile, and place the generated files in `frontend/public/assets/generated` for use as a site-wide background.

Apply the uploaded image as a full-screen background theme across the entire website (header, all pages, and footer) with a fixed/parallax-style effect, plus a dark overlay to ensure text readability.
Ensure the background theme remains professional and usable on both mobile and desktop, including graceful handling of mobile browsers that do not fully support fixed backgrounds.

In the existing menu that contains the Bengali section label “সাহায্য” (Help), add two new sub-options/buttons labeled in English as “Admin 1” and “Admin 2”, and make each option a clickable link to the corresponding Facebook profile URL:
- Admin 1: https://www.facebook.com/md.habibur.rahman.62356
- Admin 2: https://www.facebook.com/profile.php?id=61575236122760
These links must allow users to contact the admins directly by navigating to the Facebook pages.
Keep the existing menu items/sections labeled “কাজ” and “পেমেন্ট প্রুফ” as-is for now, and do not add any new functionality or additional sub-options under those sections as part of this change.
Add a mobile hamburger menu (three-line icon) in the top-right of the header that is visible on small screens and toggles a mobile navigation panel.

Ensure the mobile menu displays the Bengali sections exactly as labels: “কাজ”, “পেমেন্ট প্রুফ”, and “সাহায্য”, and under “সাহায্য” include the existing “Admin 1” and “Admin 2” Facebook links with the exact URLs already used in the footer.

Improve site-wide text readability over the fixed background image by adding consistent contrast treatments for content blocks (e.g., subtle semi-transparent dark backgrounds behind key text containers and/or stronger text shadow), while keeping the overall theme professional.

Add an animated ‘neon gradient / moving light’ effect for headings (and main titles) using high-contrast colors (Gold, Neon Green, Bright White, and optionally Neon Cyan) with a flowing/animated look, while preserving legibility.

Apply the same animated gradient glow/light effect to the primary menu items in the mobile menu (and optionally the hamburger/menu header text) so the navigation looks modern and colorful without reducing readability.

Update the ‘Explore Articles’ and ‘Learn More’ buttons in the Hero section to use neon-colored styling with a glowing hover/focus effect, while preserving accessible contrast and clear focus indicators.
Ensure the overall theme remains professional and the mobile menu interaction works reliably on mobile devices (tap targets, scroll behavior, and overlay layering over the fixed background).

Add a new, large “Welcome” section at the very top of the Home page (above the existing Hero section) that displays the provided Bengali text, center-aligned, as the first content users see when visiting “/”.

Style the Welcome section text using a neon-glow / gradient-light look with a slow-moving rainbow-style animated gradient so the letters appear to shine in multiple colors while remaining readable over the site’s background image.
Ensure the Welcome section uses a bold, aesthetically pleasing Bengali font for the Bengali text, with a sensible fallback font stack if the preferred font cannot load.

Place the Welcome text inside a semi-transparent dark, glass-style container (blur/backdrop effect) to ensure clear readability over the existing full-screen background image, and size/space the container so it feels like a prominent top-of-page welcome block.
